## Installation

You can install the development version of rpolecat like so:

``` r
library(remotes)
install_github("basil-analytics/rplover")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(rpolecat)

data(contexts)
head(contexts)

data(modes)
head(modes)
```
